com.salimov.yurii.dao.impl

Class ArticleDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.dao.impl.DataDaoImpl<Article,java.lang.Long>
      • com.salimov.yurii.dao.impl.ArticleDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArticleDao, ContentDao<Article,java.lang.Long>, DataDao<Article,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.repository")
public final class ArticleDaoImpl
extends DataDaoImpl<Article,java.lang.Long>
implements ArticleDao
    The class implements a set of standard methods for working Article objects with a database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    ArticleDao, Article, ArticleRepository, DataDaoImpl
